text: Rasmussen Reports "Scott Rasmussen Interview" (September 2009) and "Scott Rasmussen Interview" (July 2009) on The Fred Thompson Show. is an American polling company, which was founded in 2003. The company works with the collection, publication, and distribution of public opinion polling information. Rasmussen Reports conducts nightly tracking, at national and state levels, of elections, politics, current events, consumer confidence, business topics, and the United States president's job approval ratings. ==References== Category:2003 establishments in the United States Category:Companies based in New Jersey
title: Rasmussen Reports
